text: From your last battle, your mercenaries have become famous. You may use this chance to establish a mercenary branch in a friendly settlement.\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at war with the settlement's owner[[/col]]

Hrothyogg, Ogre renowned for his mercenary business, has established a mercenary branch in one of your settlements. You will receive Ogre Maneater mercenaries from time to time from now\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at the war with the Hrothyogg[[/col]]
Ogre mercenaries are recruited from Hrothyogg's mercenary branch and now is at your hand for disposal\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at the war with the Hrothyogg[[/col]]

Retreat, withdrawal or defeat by his Destroyer bring shame on Khorne's name. His punishment is grave. \\n\\n[[col:dark_r]][[img:ui/campaign ui/effect_bundles/effect_bundle_arbaal.png]][[/img]] Arbaal has lost a huge amount of reputation and will suffer from the consequences[[/col]]
You have collected a toll from tresspassing forces. Lovely

Notorious Ogre Hrothyogg, has collected toll from you\\n\\n[[col:red]]This has happened because you were in the same region as Hrothyogg where the settlement is under his rule, whilst not having allegiance or waging war with him[[/col]]
From recent hunts, the Tokmars Tribe have captured beasts for battle.
Start Thorgar's Path to Glory Quests

Thorgar the Blooded One, fervent Khurgan Zar, hungers for ultimate power. In the desolate lands where blood stains the snow, he aims to forge a dark pact with the Chaos Gods. His every deed, every soul claimed in the name of the Ruinous Powers, propels him toward the coveted title of Daemon Prince. Thorgar's ambition echoes across the icy wastes, a symphony of chaos drawing him closer to the immortal realm of the unholy. The mighty Khazag Tribe, his loyal marauders, willingly tread the path of anarchy alongside their leader, bound to his destiny by the crimson threads of allegiance.

In the desolation of the Chaos Wastes, Engra Deathsword emerges as Archaon's formidable lieutenant and chief recruiter. Clad in malevolent armor, he strides with purpose, gathering the mighty chaos champions who heed the call of destruction. Engra, a living shadow in the unholy legion, beckons warriors to Archaon's banner. Under his ominous guidance, they form a dark brotherhood, ready to unleash chaos upon the world at the Everchosen's command

Fueled by bloodlust, the Destroyer of Khorne remains undefeated, and as he strings together more victories and his power grows, so does his unbridled lust for more slaughter. But suffer defeat or dare retreat and Khorne's punishment will be unrelenting..

Entrusted with a task deemed insurmountable, Duriath Helbane, the Witch King's fierce corsair, sets sail for the enigmatic Island of Tor Elithis. Cloaked in mystery and under High Elven dominion, the island lies distant and perilous, a realm untouched by the ambitions of the Dark Elves. Yet, the Witch King's will has spoken, and Duriath is the chosen harbinger of impending conquest

His momentum breaks the very laws of time. \\n\\n[[col:green]]Due to Arbaal's rage, all of your character's movement is restored[[/col]]\\n[[col:red]]But Khorne is still not satisfied and demands even more blood, decreasing your reputation[[/col]]

In the shadow of Tor Elithis, a sacred place known as 'The Far Place' has long suffered the taint of the Norscans, threatening the delicate balance of nature in the region. As the Wood Elves, you have undertaken the arduous task of cleansing this land and restoring its purity. After years of dedication and the completion of the Ritual of Cleansing, The Far Place is now reborn, free from the malevolent influence of the Norscans.
The blood of men stains the earth, and the howls rise in answer. Ice Wolves heed the call, eager to swell your ranks.
